subject: replacement part for simsonn pedals
description_text:
hello
didn't get response from my last answer,
i will need plastic washer behind clutch spring because somehow mine was
broken

[image: 0.jpg]
you said to provide ticket number for that part,
beside my order for simsoon vam pro linear motor
but i don't see my ticket number

best regards
Andrej

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrej Vojvoda,    We will provide the appropriate adapter plug for your region of purchase, so you may proceed with confidence. Additionally, you may specify your requirements and your ticket number in the order notes, and we shall dispatch these to you alongside your order.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053500730

where i can see ticket number?
greetings
Andrej

On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 12:57 PM service@simsonn.com
ID 为 8019 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8019  
      主题: about Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor  
      描述:  
 helllo 
 i want to ask few things 
 is possible to order the Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors with eu cabble? 
   
 and i will ask if there is possible to order spare parts for pedals? somehow the edge of plastic washer on clutch pedal is broken. i did fix it but i want to replace it 
 
  
 
   
 
greetings

 
 
 Andrej
Hi Andrej Vojvoda,    We apologize for the delayed response. Please provide your order number, and we will arrange for a replacement shipment as soon as possible.

hello
my order number is
Order #SSN5026

best regards
Andrej

On Wed, Dec 17, 2025 at 10:34 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Andrej Vojvoda,    Alright, I've had our warehouse add this part to your order.
